H3.text: what was the religion in persia before islam. Zoroastrian

A4.text: Zoroastrianism was the official religion of successive Iranian polities, beginning with the Achaemenid Empire, and ending with the Sasanian Empire.

A5.text: Manichaeism adopted many of the Yazatas for its own pantheon.
